entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes, multiple_queries #61561
  • Perf improvement: updates #61560
  • Blazor WebAssembly browser debugging fails with UriFormatException using recent Chrome versions #61559
  • Minimal API Validation fails for DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #61558

Closed

  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-validation #61542
  • Perf regression: json, kestrel-hostheader-mismatch #61556
  • Preload Blazor WebAssembly resources to improve startup time #58875
    10.0-preview4
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #61552
  • Consider making array allocation size in `HPackDecoder` configurable. #60313

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Use inline boot config in tests #61557
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add IMemoryPoolFactory and cleanup memory pool while idle #61554
    feature-iis, feature-kestrel, feature-httpsys, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Cosmos/VectorSearch: split VectorType into two separate annotations and remove it from public APIs (since it's pubternal) #35965
    10.0.0
  • Cosmos/Vector: move vector related model validation (e.g. composite index) to container creation #35903
    10.0.0
  • Cosmos: cleanup CosmosModelValidator to use helper methods rather than FindAnnotation in various validation methods #35897
    10.0.0
  • Cleanup code around experimental features that are no longer experimental (e.g. vector search for cosmos) #35886
    10.0.0
  • Cosmos: rename CosmosIndexBuilderExtensions.ForVectors to IsVectorIndex #35895
    10.0.0
  • Unique index constraints not being created with PostgreSQL 16 #35966

Updated

  • AOT .Skip(n).Take(n) query errors at runtime #35968
    Backlog
  • EF Core 9 no longer applies COALESCE in SQL translation for DefaultIfEmpty() which causing an InvalidOperationException #35950
  • Select inside Include #35967
  • Remove reference joins in split queries #29182
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Cleanup around vector in Cosmos #35960

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • URI redirect doesn't match the WebAuthenticatorCallbackActivity pattern but should #29089
  • MAUI iOS Build stuck in _XamarinBuildDownloadCore Task #29087
  • SwipeView Closes when Content Changes even with SwipeBehaviorOnInvoked="RemainOpen" (iOS only) #29086
  • [MacCatalyst] DisplayActionSheet is spreading horizontal #29085

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] SwipeView Closes when Content Changes - fix #29088
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview

Updated

  • [iOS] Fixed KeepLastItemInView for CV1 and added support for KeepLastItemInView for CV2 #28720
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR7
  • Implement layout system performance metrics #29074
    community ✨
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Poor overload resolution failure diagnostic for first class span Contains scenario #78211

Closed

  • EnC: avoid cascading rebuilds if project reference copies output assembly #78217
  • EnC: Include projects that depend on a project with changed public APIs in projectsToRebuild #78218
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10518.148 #78216
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10518.29 #78209

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ApplyUpdates API to account for no-effect changes #78220
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: honor OverloadResolutionPriority attribute #78219
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Extensions: adjust specialname rules #78215
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Extensions: apply inconsistent accessibility check to static members too #78214
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert "Move assembly versions back to 4.14.0.0" #78210
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Cache MEF catalog in servicehub process #78122
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Adding new EA api at 'Features' layer for unit testing ot use #78175
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move DiagnosticService impl down to Features layer #78155
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implement ref safety analysis for instance compound assignment operators #78199
    Area-Compilers, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Clean up output capture on .NET Core #78205
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Native AOT]Problem with polymorphic calls #114835
  • It's possible to change the string object in a safe context. #114834
  • Allow file watching for rooted paths within PhysicalFileProvider #114833
  • [API Proposal]: Add non-overflowing widening sum to Vector types #114832
  • [Analyzer]: Flag non-productive uses of `RegexOptions.NonBacktracking`. #114831

Closed

  • JIT: We can remove `getTypeForBoxOnStack` #114204
    10.0.0
  • ClientWebSocket.SendAsync() api remarks section un clear on limitation and undefined behavior #114816
  • `libnethost.lib` contains LTCG objects again #113183
    9.0.x
  • [Android] System.Security.Cryptography.Tests RSA signature validation failures #114772

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix the amd64 cross-DAC stack unwinding #114836
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add custom exception handlers to generated COM wrappers #114828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove getTypeForBoxOnStack from jit interface #114754
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deref pointer in minipal/time #114598
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [clr-interp] Add support for virtual method calls #114529
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [browser] Preload dotnet.js #114534
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2690943 #114807
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/9.0-staging] [wasm] Read messages from binlog if process output is missing build finished message #114676
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.x
  • Replace compiler specific options with C++ `thread_local` keyword #114660
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove unsafe code from Http KnownHeaders #114757
    area-System.Net.Http, reduce-unsafe, 10.0.0
  • Change CrlBuilderTests to use a static RSA key with better support. #114804
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 10.0.0

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from labs, all except JIT #114675
    area-VM-coreclr, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • [TEST] No-op comment change #114048
    NO-REVIEW, test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • Abolish PSPSym from ABI #114630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Create transport package and rename the cdac reader #114812
    needs-area-label
  • Fixes grammar in comments for Gen2GcCallback.cs #114674
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [browser] Use OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders=true in browser template #113654
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Improve the functionality of LoongArch64 R2R #114666
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • [Mobile] Upload build log artifacts for reporting build times in perflab #113469
    tenet-build-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline, 10.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some bugs to make NativeAOT stable. #114618
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Learn what's failing about the OSSL tests on new mac queues #114163
    area-System.Security
  • Add CPUID for AvxVnniInt8 and AvxVnniInt16 #113956
    community-contribution, needs-area-label

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dotnet-watch]: Watch project output binaries and notify Roslyn on project rebuild #48592

PullRequests

Created

  • Add --os, --arch and --cross in VMR build script #48591

Merged

  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Use inline boot config in tests #48590
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk

Updated

  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Select the NativeAOT runtime pack as the target package when it's provided as part of the KnownILCompilerPack metadata #46611
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Disable loading code style analyzers when building from VS #48522
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • realpath in c# #45637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
